entry.title: How to understand user behaviour using Multiple Linear Regression?
entry.summary:
Description

Studying the user behaviour on app/website is one of the most hot topics among product companies. Multiple linear regression exactly helps you to find out the most important factors about your user and deliver the most important features to them. We will discuss the process, and the pros â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Studying the user behaviour on app/website is one of the most hot topics among product companies. Multiple linear regression exactly helps you to find out the most important factors about your user and deliver the most important features to them. We will discuss the process, and the pros and cons of it.
